function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of sector-specific pandemic control regulations and guidelines","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Customers’ preferences redirected from hypermarkets to decentralized commercial places due to fear of covid-19, leading to increased crowding in smaller spaces.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in urban design towards decentralized and restructuring of public spaces due to covid-19 concerns.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of workplace regulations and directives to mitigate covid-19 transmission among workers and visitors.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fast transmission rates of the virus","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health and physical well-being concerns for employees","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lingering persistence of the virus","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread and impact of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased psychosocial needs due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate mental health support for patients and the public during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate mental health support for healthcare providers during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overwhelmed health care systems due to stress on individual providers and general operations during a contagious disease outbreak","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Psychological distress due to mass home-confinement directives, including stress, depression, irritability, insomnia, fear, confusion, anger, frustration, boredom, and stigma associated with quarantine.","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intensified distress due to conflicting messages, differences among stay-at-home orders, and conflicting messages from government and public health authorities.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imposition of unfamiliar public health measures that infringe on personal freedoms","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conflicting messages from authorities","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncontrolled socialization on balconies","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal access to daylight, nature, and thermal comfort due to socioeconomic status","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased time spent in the bedroom not sleeping, but engaging in activities like watching movies or using social media, which can be problematic for resident well-being.","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear optimal light levels for each room can lead to dissatisfaction with lighting conditions, impacting resident well-being.","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public health regulations","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Urban densification leading to concentration of apartment housing in urban centers","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Population-level mobility fluxes obtained from facebook data for good may raise privacy and ethical concerns.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of public compliance with npis such as isolation, testing, and school closures.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved information to occupants may lead to increased social interaction and closer proximity, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legislative limitations affecting BACS improvements","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Healthcare facility comfort improvements in BACS","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of on-site storage for domestic hot water due to healthcare legislation","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Healthcare legislation restriction on on-site storage for domestic hot water","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene and sanitation in healthcare facilities","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor hygiene and sanitation practices","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High energy expenditure during the operational phase of buildings and non-compliance with energy efficiency standards can lead to significant environmental and climate impacts.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid growth of technology industry leading to increased data mining and analytics","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Growth of IoT and WSN implementation without harmonization of noninteroperable technologies and protocols.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Industry-driven development of business intelligence and analytics BIA tools without significant academic input.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large-scale deployment of WSN without proper security measures may lead to unauthorized access and potential malicious interference, including spreading malware or viruses.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of network-addressable devices embedded in everyday objects","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Number of connected devices to reach over 20 billion 'things' by 2020","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited scale and scope of proof-of-concept or project-specific IEQ monitoring systems may hinder their widespread implementation in built environments.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in technological context to low-cost hardware and open-source software may introduce cybersecurity vulnerabilities in IEQ monitoring systems.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate health policymaking in China and elsewhere","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on curbing climate change","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of concern for the health of the environment","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extended survival of bioaerosols due to PM5 and No2","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher mortality rates in provinces with worst air pollution","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited systematic COVID-19 testing at a national scale in China, leading to exclusion of asymptomatic cases and potentially inflated mortality rates.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of satellite and ground station data to compute average air pollution measurements at the prefecture level in China.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Chronic exposure to air pollution linked to spread of SARS-CoV-2 in Chinese cities.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental factors contributing to the emergence and spread of epidemics, including overpopulation, biodiversity loss, and climate change","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak public health surveillance","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"}]}
